column2: "Hey partner! Have you been trying different classes?"
"Compared to older generations, we can change our aptitude at will. It's best to try other options."
"For me, I'm a Ranger and I'll probably stay this way."
"But I wonder why we can change our class so easily now?"
"Doesn't seem like there's been any research done since then that would make it possible..."
"I wonder if they're doing experiments on us in our sleep or something?"
"Like that would happen! I'm pretty sure we'd notice something like that."
"Well, at least we're free to choose what we like. Find the best option that works for you, later!"
